events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer role submitted by the candidate. The resume and cover letter indicate strong experience in backend development.
After review, this application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate's background in software development and engineering.
The recruiting team has assigned a dedicated recruiter to manage communications and coordinate further steps for this engineering candidate.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call focusing on the candidate's experience with software engineering and system design principles. The conversation was encouraging.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in moving forward to the technical interview stage for the engineering position.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities relevant to the software developer role.
